name: CKB-ESP32
description: Nervos CKB blockchain client for ESP32. Full node and indexer RPC, on-device secp256k1 signing (RFC6979, no mbedTLS), bech32m address encode/decode/convert (all CKB formats), modular build profiles, TelegramSerial wireless output.
keywords: nervos, ckb, blockchain, rpc, web3, crypto, signing, secp256k1, bech32m, payments
